org.jactr.modules.threaded.procedural

Class AlternatingProductionSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jactr.core.module.procedural.six.DefaultProductionSelector
      • org.jactr.modules.threaded.procedural.AlternatingProductionSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProductionSelector

    public class AlternatingProductionSelector
extends DefaultProductionSelector
    production selector for threaded cognition that strictly alternates between different goals, whenever possible
    Author:
    harrison

    • Method Detail

      • select

        public IInstantiation select(java.util.Collection<IInstantiation> instantiations)
        we select the first instantiation if 1) there was no previous goal or 2) there is no production that doesn't match the previousGoal. Otherwise, we select the first instantiation that matches to something other than previous goal
        Specified by:
        select in interface IProductionSelector
        Overrides:
        select in class DefaultProductionSelector
